title: CoinageMint
author: CoinageMint

content: Looking to sell one of my loaded coins.1HodlClub Bitcoin Hourglass 1oz Fine Silver Coin.Although these have not yet sold out and can be purchased from 1hodlclub.store, you will not find one like this with a very low serial number.Please DM offershttps://imgur.com/gallery/5dLxy2rEdit: will swap for cards

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: BumpSurprised no takers so far, anyone who is willing to ship a couple of collector boxes to me would be getting this coin at close to loaded value, which is very cheap for a nice silver coin in the sub #5 serial number range.

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: If no takers I will peel this coin on the weekend and put the BTC towards a couple more boxes of the Cardsmith Currency cards.I would prefer to swap this to a collector but the post has been up for long enough now.

comments.author: SurfinPanda
comments.body: Please PM me with the details and the price and I may be interested.Thanks

comments.author: iHODLwell
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on March 26, 2023, 05:33:26 AMLooking to sell one of my loaded coins.1HodlClub Bitcoin Hourglass 1oz Fine Silver Coin.Although these have not yet sold out and can be purchased from 1hodlclub.store, you will not find one like this with a very low serial number.Please DM offershttps://imgur.com/gallery/5dLxy2rEdit: will swap for cardsWhat cards did you have in mind? I would like to get my hands on one, and would be willing to exchange cards, just let me know what you’re looking for and I’ll see if I don’t have something. Thanks!Tony

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: If you extend your offer to also trade for some other collectibles, shoot me pm.Which part of the world are you shipping from?And the coin is loaded with 0.0021 BTC I assume, can you provide the address (via pm if you prefer)?

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: I have just made a deal to trade this coin for some Cardsmith Currency cards, series 1 boxes.Thanks for everyone interested.Closing this thread now
